ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Guild Loot Rules
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye without participation we could not kill the things we want to kill.  I had become a casual player, or even less, so that is one reason I decided to go.
ygData.messageBody:
Aye without participation we could not kill the things we want to kill. I
had become a casual player, or even less, so that is one reason I decided to
go. Casual players can get loot, but it is only going to be after everyone
else has what they want, and if you are lucky enough that the mob you want
something off is still being killed.

I don't think I would have been kicked out or anything, but I also wasn't
contributing anymore. Most of the guild plays every night or at least 6
nights a week from 5:30pm on. Recently it was asked (or ordered, however
you want to see it hehe) that every member attend at least 1 raid per week,
which isn't much to ask at all but I wasn't even doing that much when I
quit.

Shada
